fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_clarification: A permanent organization connotes a substantial number of personnel who are responsible for carrying out party activities outside of the election season.
fxInfo_cross_coder_aggregation: Bayesian Item Response Theory Measurement Model
fxInfo_question: How many political parties for national-level office have permanent organizations?

fxInfo_responses.value: Fewer than half of the parties.
More than half of the parties.

fxInfo_scale: Ordinal, converted to interval by the measurement model
name: v2psorgs, *_osp, *_ord
